name: Codex (ZeroSnk)
description:
This is just a simple game I've been putting together for myself. I did want to share it with my friends and maybe anybody whose willing to give it a shot. Now I ain't saying this is going to hit you right in the feels button but!!!!! I am hoping to make it something awesome.

So i'm kind of going for this..

Firefly space adventure with FF6 mix with other rpg things..So you know, I've got a lot of work cut out for me.

What I've got here is a basic and barley working first addition model super ALPHA...

but if you're so inclined to be truthfully mean leave your comments here orrrrr HERE. Destroy me if it makes you feel better, lets admit tohugh, we know you want to.

ta-ta
